messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

permissions on new hello we had some permissions issues one starting th february was raised for fixing issue notification was sent our together with investigated issue identified was removed visitors main site collection moment we cannot identify root cause issue but we have scenario when happen due wrong permissions full access we have moment but we have item backlog about we also planning more trainings about managing permissions yesterday we added sites main site collection also we looked through your location saw visitor access let arrange call understand better issue please advise appropriate for call thanks engineer en sent wednesday february re permissions importance high hello please log urgently for being assign can take look thank you best regards leader ext annual leave notice sent wednesday february permissions importance high hello discussed please below looking forward your response kind regards incident manager sent wednesday february permissions importance high hello guys discussed there seems be serious issue with permissions hub for some reason after issues yesterday permissions have changed removed permissions pool causing disruptions have access documents other types documentation please can be logged high priority impacting users especially provide more details thanks kind regards leader en
